public class ManualScene
extends java.lang.Object
EXTENSION: new class for manual/info scene and buttons

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ManualScene()
    ? Construct info screen for game, construct exit and back to menu button
    ? BACK TO MENU button leads back to START screen
    ? EXIT button exits the entire application
